attributes.action: instruct the Daily Mail to stop being a pretentious Big Brother organisation, constantly spouting PC nonsense and whipping the impressionable self righteous folk into a frenzy, and to stop trying to dictate how the people of Britain should think. Furthermore, the Daily Mail should be made to understand that whilst its editorial dept may find something offensive, others may find it funny, and this does not give them the right to ostracise and attempt to belittle those people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign up and let the "Daily Wail" see that not everybody lives in their bubble.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
